text: zerok Zēṛōk () is the main town of Zerok District in Paktika Province, Afghanistan.Paktika farmers seek market for bumper pine nuts yield. Pajhwok Afghan News.2 U.S. troops killed in Afghanistan. CNN. It is located within the heart of Zadran land on the main Khost-Urgun road. ==See also== * Khost * Loya Paktia ==References== Category:Populated places in Paktika Province
title: Zerok
